he default serialization of {@code Id(com.foo.MyObject.class, 20L)} will be * {"clazz":com.foo.MyObject,"value":20}. Suppose, you just want the output to be * the value instead, which is {@code 20} in this case. You can achieve that by writing a custom * serializer:
